meanings.definition: A cavity in the body, especially one filled with air, that is lined with a mucous membrane.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined my sinus to check for any infections.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the pressure in my sinus when I had a cold.
meanings.sent3: The sinus in my nose decided to produce extra mucus at the worst possible time.
meanings.sent4: Her sinus of knowledge was always clear and free from ignorance.
meanings.sent5: The sinus was like a tiny room in my head, always needing to be kept clean.

meanings.definition: A curve, bend, or recess in a surface or line.
meanings.sent1: The sinus of the road made it difficult to see around the corner.
meanings.sent2: The sinus in the wall created a cozy nook for the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The sinus in the path caused a funny zigzag in our walk.
meanings.sent4: Her smile formed a sinus of happiness on her face.
meanings.sent5: The sinus in the riverbank was a perfect spot for fishing.

meanings.definition: A mathematical function that describes a smooth periodic oscillation.
meanings.sent1: The sinus function is used to model sound waves.
meanings.sent2: I struggled to understand the sinus curve in my math class.
meanings.sent3: The sinus equation danced on the paper, confusing everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a sinus-like pattern that was soothing to listen to.
meanings.sent5: The sinus graph on the screen showed the wave's pattern clearly.
